description.lang: The micro smart dimmer is a Z-Wave device designed to work with various types of light sources. It may beconnected to two-wire or three-wire configuration so it can operate with or without neutral lead. Thedimmer can switch or dim connected light source either through Z-Wave devices or through the wallswitch connected directly to it. The smart dimmer is equipped with an algorithm of smart light sourcedetection which makes configuration easier and ensures high compatibility of the device. It may be usedas a switch with non-dimmable light sources (in 3-wire connection).

dimmer, send u0022Device Reset Locally Notification CCu0022 to associateddevices of this group to report factory reset information.2. When load state changes, send u0022Basic Report CCu0022 to associateddevices of this group.3. When a load over current is detected, send u0022Over-currentdetectedu0022 to Lifeline.4. When a mains voltage drop is detected, send u0022Voltage drop/driftu0022 to Lifeline.5. When over temperature is detected, send Emergency shutoffstatusu0022 to Lifeline.

name.lang: Enable/disable to detect load after re-power on

description.lang: Enable/disable to detect load after re-power on(detect load type, minimum brightness,maximum brightness)Note: When the device does not belong to anynetwork, load detection will be enabled everytime after re-power on. When the device hasalready been added to a network, load detectionwill be disabled.
enable to detect every time after re-power on
enable to detect only after first re-power on
Wiring typeNote: this parameter is read only
Load typeNote: this parameter is read only
Enable/disable over current protection (over 1.5A for 20 seconds continuously)

name.lang: Power automatic report absolute threshold, unit is W

description.lang: Power automatic report absolute threshold, unit is WWhen power changes above the absolutethreshold, immediately report current power value
When power changes above the absolute threshold, immediately report current power value

name.lang: Power automatic report percentage threshold, unit is %

description.lang: Power automatic report percentage threshold, unit is %When power changes above the percentage threshold, immediately report current power value
When power changes above the percentage threshold, immediately report current power value

name.lang: Enable/disable to send the basic report

description.lang: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed (When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution.
the bigger the value is, the higher the loads minimum brightness is

name.lang: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network

description.lang: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network (when enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a network)
